## NCEAS Training Course

This is training data for NCEAS CoreR course October 2024.This contains qmd and data files in the scripts folder and index files in the main training_wapman folder to practice publishing to the web. The book can be found at [NCEAS Training Book](https://learning.nceas.ucsb.edu/2024-10-coreR/session_20.html). The data can be accessed from links in the book.
